sentences.en: A novel all - optical pulse shaper based on nonlinear optical loop mirror is proposed in this letter.
sentences.cn: 提出了一种基于光纤环形镜的全光脉冲整形器.

sentences.en: A survey on recent studies of lapel shaper was made.
sentences.cn: 摘要对国内外对翻领成形器的研究作了简要综述.

sentences.en: Designing of external gear shaper cutter with large tip relief angle can improve the meshing quality.
sentences.cn: 滚刀、插齿刀设计成较大的修缘角,有利于提高啮合质量.

sentences.en: Grindingcutter, reamer, disc tool, gear shaper cutter, slide way of machine tool and tool guide.
sentences.cn: 铣刀 、 铰刀 、 盘形车刀 、 插齿刀 、 机床导轨和刀架.

sentences.en: He concluded that the sexual drive was the most powerful shaper of a person's psychology, and that sexuality was present even in infants.
sentences.cn: 他得出的结论是，性冲动是个人心理最有力的塑造者，即使是婴儿，他们也有性欲。

sentences.en: New progresses of mathematic models, section profiles and engineering application for lapel shaper were introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍了国内外在翻领成型器的数学模型 、 截面形式和应用研究等方面的进展.

sentences.en: Say what you will about Apple, but Steve Jobs’ company is a market shaper, and the iPad is the only tablet that could shove the computing world in a new direction.
sentences.cn: 不管怎么说苹果公司，这个史蒂夫乔布斯的公司都是一个市场塑造者，iPad将是唯一引领计算界新方向的平板电脑。

sentences.en: Shaper - Challenging, dynamic, thrives on pressure . The drive and courage to overcome obstacles.
sentences.cn: 可塑性:富有挑战性, 有动力的, 有很强的抗压力,有战胜困难的动力和勇气.

sentences.en: The shaper castes are the keepers of the intricate biotechnology employed by the Yuuzhan Vong.
sentences.cn: 塑形者阶层(shapercaste)掌管着遇战疯人复杂的生物工艺学(biotechnology).

sentences.en: This paper introduces reform scheme to specific numerical control shaper.
sentences.cn: 本文介绍专用数控刨床的改造方案.

sentences.en: You are the shaper of your own destiny.
sentences.cn: 自己是自己命运的创造者.
